mapper.sql: login_log_id AS "loginLogId", account AS "account", name AS "name", company_id AS "companyId", client_id AS "clientId", operation AS "operation", ip_address AS "ipAddress", local_address AS "localAddress", login_time AS "loginTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT ll.login_log_id AS loginLogId, ll.account AS account, ll.`name` AS `name`, ll.company_id AS companyId, ll.client_id AS clientId, c.`name` AS clientName, ll.operation AS operation, ll.ip_address as ipAddress, ll.local_address AS localAddress, ll.login_time AS loginTime FROM biemo_auth_login_log ll LEFT JOIN biemo_auth_client c ON ll.client_id = c.client_id WHERE 1 = 1
and ll.account like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%')
ORDER BY ll.login_time DESC

SELECT ll.login_log_id AS loginLogId, ll.account AS account, ll.`name` AS `name`, ll.company_id AS companyId, ll.client_id AS clientId, c.`name` AS clientName, ll.operation AS operation, ll.ip_address as ipAddress, ll.local_address AS localAddress, ll.login_time AS loginTime FROM biemo_auth_login_log ll LEFT JOIN biemo_auth_client c ON ll.client_id = c.client_id WHERE ll.login_log_id = #{loginLogId}
